DOC.brief_summary: Many woman men fertile age risk sexual transmit infection unwanted pregnancy , insufficient knowledge health promote lifestyle prior conception . There need increase awareness among people fertile age sexual risk-taking unhealthy lifestyle negatively affect fertility pregnancy outcome . Previous study preconception health care mainly focus woman . The aim study investigate Reproductive Life Plan-based counseling midwife could increase men 's reproductive knowledge . The second aim evaluate men 's experience intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Reproductive Life Plan-based Counseling With Men
